Title: A Sleepy Pet
Description:
Posidriss's sleeping troubles are still causing them many problems. This is preventing them from developing their connection to the Dream.

Bears hibernate, bears dream, bear cubs are soft, warm and cuddly. Some of the cubs in the Dragon Isles are even connected to the Dream. Can you fetch one from Lysindra for Posidriss?
ObjectivesText: Obtain a Bear Cub pet for Posidriss.
